name: RE (20)
description:
This crash occurred on a 2 lane undivided roadway curving to the right, with a posted speed limit of  89KPH (55MPH) and a -2.5% grade.  Many driveways for retail establishments intersect the roadway.  It should be noted that there was a black on yellow curve warning sign with a suggested speed limit of 72 KPH (45 MPH) prior to the curve. The weather was clear and the roadway was dry. This crash occurred on a weekday morning.  
vehicle1, a vehicle1, was traveling south on the 2 lane undivided roadway when it stopped to allow northbound traffic to pass before making a left turn into a driveway. vehicle2, a vehicle2 xl, was traveling on the same 2 lane undivided roadway, in the same direction behind vehicle1. vehicle2 impacted the rear of vehicle1 with its front. both vehicles came to rest in the roadway facing south.
